titleStmt.title: A looking-glasse for all true Christians, very usefull and necessary for all people of what degree soever to look upon in these troublesome times of sorrow. The tune is, Aim not to high.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, W. Gilbertson.,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
